entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 4.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 then north 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
